name: Next.js GCS Signed GET URL
description: Generate a signed GET URL for Google Cloud Storage.

files.template:
import { Storage } from '@google-cloud/storage';
export async function GET(){ const storage = new Storage(); const [url] = await storage.bucket(process.env.GCS_BUCKET!).file('download.bin').getSignedUrl({ action:'read', expires: Date.now()+5*60*1000 }); return Response.json({ url }); }
